name: Single Player Tarkov
author: cocomarti0208@gmail.com
description:
Single Player Tarkov (SPT) transforms your Escape From Tarkov (EFT) client into a fully offline experience.
No more server downtime, cheaters, or forced PvP. Enjoy realistic raids, quest progression, and steady character development on your own terms.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

apk update && apk add -q 7zip

if [ -z "${GITHUB_USER}" ] && [ -z "${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN}" ] ; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    echo -e "user and oauth token set"
    alias curl='curl -u ${GITHUB_USER}:${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN} '
fi

LATEST_JSON=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/cocorico8/build-linux/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/cocorico8/build-linux/releases")


if [ -z "${SPT_VERSION}" ] || [ "${SPT_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq -r '.assets[].browser_download_url')
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${SPT_VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${SPT_VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${SPT_VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url')
    else
        echo -e "Release not found, defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq -r '.assets[].browser_download_url')
    fi
fi

wget ${DOWNLOAD_URL} -O ${SPT_NAME}
7z x -y ${SPT_NAME}
rm ${SPT_NAME}
chmod +x SPT.Server.exe
